name: Eragon's Tale
description:
Eragon's Tale is a horror adventure game that follows the story of Eragon, a young lad of a noble family. During the party celebrating the passing of the family elder, an artifact of great value is stolen. Soon after, Eragon starts seeing nightmares, and somehow these two events are intertwined...

During the game, you will travel through the dreamland, and meanwhile, in the real world, foul deeds are afoot. Find clues and important items to get through the puzzles the dreams will present to you.

There are dark creatures roaming in the dreamland, so you will have to take care not to get caught by them!

Features

  • Story-driven horror adventure
  • Point & Click interactions
  • Retro pixel art graphics
  • Puzzles to complete
